channel.title: Where on Year Zero
channel.description: Recent content in Where on Year Zero

item.title: Where I went in Year Zero
item.description: I carried my phone with me almost everywhere in 2017. I used Swarm (formerlly the ‘check in’ part of Foursquare) to track the places I went. I then wrote some code to extract that from the Foursquare API and produce the map above and the lists below. All of the code is on GitHub - you can fork me! Steps I walked 2,999,935 steps during Year Zero. That about 1872 km.
